ABOUT US

We are a 100% Black Owned Coding Training company. We believe in empowering the youth with real world applicable coding skills in any language or platform. Coding is regarded as a critical missing skill in South Africa. It is often imported at a high unsustainable cost.

WE OFFER TRAINING IN:

  • • Java Development Training: Four (4) months
  • • AWS Practitioner certification: Four (4) weeks
  • • AWS Developer certification: Six (6) to eight (8) weeks
